name: Reaper's Intern
description:
You are the Reaper's Intern. While your boss is out there in the living world reaping people, it is your job to judge whether people belong to Hell or Heaven.

But be careful: After each shift there must be an equilibrium between Hell and Heaven (+/-1 person).

You are working in 3 shifts, during which you will be judging 5 persons per shift.

To Judge you've got your handy Book of Life, which tells you everything about the persons life with all their good deeds as well as their sins. For each good deed or sin you are given one Soul Coin. It is your job to guess which Soul Coin corresponds to which good deed or sin and weigh their good deeds against their sins. With the good deeds and sins outweighed you can then determine their fate with the judge button.

Controls

Move Mouse - Look around
F - pickup a coin
Mouse Wheel - drag/push pickedup coin
Left Mouse Button - Activate Judge Button while looking at it.

Developed by Just2 (Developers)
